about_the_game:
Deadnaut: Signal Lost is a sci-fi horror turn-based roguelike where loyalty isn't earned - it's installed. As the Handler, you'll remotely control a single Deadnaut, a treasure hunter navigating hazardous settlements, drifting derelicts, and confronting nightmarish creatures, haywire security systems, and dangerous fanatics. But remember: your Deadnaut is not your friend. Either gain their trust or pay them off.

And if those don't work? There's always the failsafe on their puppeting software...


  • 5 playable suits - Security, Energy, Tech, Sensor and Labour - with expansive upgrade trees
  • Procedurally generated levels varying from small scouts and massive, multi-deck cryoships to secluded outposts and spread-out settlements
  • Atmospheric soundtrack and dynamic ambience - listening will save your life
  • Lightweight meta progression via collectible "Sigils" that impart powerful modifiers that change how you play
  • Build trust between the Handler and Deadnaut, based on how well you do. Offer bribes if it gets low, or wipe their memory and puppet them instead
  • Character creator where you can pick a suit, assign stats and import your own portraits
  • Traditional roguelike (permadeath, exploration and replayability) with "on-the-run" progression in the spirit of FTL and Slay the Spire


The cosmos is tearing itself apart. Wrecks are full of horrible, interdimensional creatures, the dead roam surfaces of moons, and you’re being hunted by technically advanced soldiers. Experience the world of Deadnaut up close.


Keep your Deadnaut loyal or force compliance. Pay them off or turn them into a mindless space golem if necessary, but remember: everything comes at a price.


Select from five exosuits, each with dozens of unique skills and abilities. Customise your Deadnaut with weapons, sensors, shields, cloaks and hack tools. Choose from the heavy-duty Labour suit, the ghostly Sensor suit, or the gravity-bending Energy suit, or other playstyles to match your preferences.




Encounter dozens of enemy types, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Avoid – or exploit – the security system in each level, from the Watchers that roam ships to the malfunctioning security Towers and Sentinels that guard settlements. Stay one step ahead of the Benefactors, advanced supersoldiers in relentless pursuit, determined to stop you from reaching the Rip's source.


Develop your Deadnaut and maximise their potential by discovering powerful synergies among 180+ upgrades, and tailor your weapons and gear to face the challenges that await you. Get started with a premade Deadnaut or create your own unique character. Adjust their stats and even import your own photo to truly make your Deadnaut your own.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 2.6GHz quad-core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or similar
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: While the game may run on other Linux distributions, we only support Ubuntu 18.04+.

name: Deadnaut: Signal Lost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 2.6GHz quad-core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Alien by way of Duskers ... a tantalising dystopian space horror setting.”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“[Signal Lost] cultivates a lot of atmosphere ... like a creeping sort of anxious experience versus the rip and tear [of] Jupiter Hell.”
Splattercat

“I'm very excited ... it's not often that we get [a] mint-quality, modern feeling traditional roguelike.”
Etsy8nine
short_description: Deadnaut: Signal Lost is a sci-fi horror turn-based roguelike where loyalty isn't earned - it's installed. Scavenge derelict ships and abandoned moons filled with hellish creatures, brutal AI and insanity storms. Gather gear and upgrades to fight or evade the hi-tech supersoldiers hunting you down.
